ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: If he had made up any sayings and ascribed them to Us,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Had he attributed falsely any words to Us,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And if he [i.e., the Prophets] had forged this Discourse and thereafter ascribed it to Us,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Had Muhammad invented some words against Us,.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And had he fabricated just one matter upon Us –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And if he had forged a false saying concerning Us,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And if he had fabricated against Us some of the sayings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Had he invented against Us any sayings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And if he had invented false sayings concerning Us,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: if he had invented any lies about Us,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And if he had forged concerning us some discourses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Had he faked any sayings in Our name,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And if the messenger were to invent any sayings in Our name,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And if he (Muhammad SAW) had forged a false saying concerning Us (Allah),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Had he invented sayings against Us,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Had he falsely attributed some statements to Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And if Muhammad had made up about Us some [false] sayings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:44] And had he, namely, the Prophet (s), fabricated any lies against Us, by communicating from Us that which We have not said,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And if he had invented) and had Muhammad (pbuh) invented (false sayings concerning Us) lies against Us and attributed to Us that which We did not say,
